title: Name of Department and Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 408 of 2020))
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Housing (Regulation of Approved
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Housing (Regulation of Approved 

Housing Bodies) Act 2019 (Commencement) (No. 2) Order 2021.
text_norm: 1 order may cited housing (regulation approved housing bodies) act 2019 (commencement) (no 2) order 2021

title: Name of Department and Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 408 of 2020))
heading: 2. The 1st day of July 2021 is appointed as the day on which the following
text_raw:
2. The 1st day of July 2021 is appointed as the day on which the following 
provisions of the Housing (Regulation of Approved Housing Bodies) Act 2019 
(No. 47 of 2019) shall come into operation: 

(a) paragraph (c) of subsection (1) of section 9; 

(b) 

section 37 (other than subsections (7) and (8)). 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

30 June, 2021. 

DARRAGH O’BRIEN, 

Minister for Housing, Local Government and Heritage. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 2nd July, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [320] 3
